summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting an interview conducted on August 24, 2020, with a witness (name redacted) about their knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The witness describes knowing Epstein starting around 1995, his relationship with Maxwell, and a concerning trip to New Mexico in 1996 involving the witness's friend, who was a student. The document details the friend's disturbing experience and subsequent fear of Maxwell and Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the investigation. The witness describes knowing him starting around 1995, receiving calls from him, and his sponsorship of student trips, including one to New Mexico in 1996.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to by Epstein as his wife. Described as hosting and watching students during a trip to New Mexico. The witness's friend expressed fear of her, stating she was from a 'really bad family' and that Maxwell and Epstein were 'too rich and powerful to fight'.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: One of the officials conducting the interview of the witness on August 24, 2020.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: One of the officials conducting the interview of the witness on August 24, 2020.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: One of the officials conducting the interview of the witness on August 24, 2020.

connections.description: Epstein referred to Maxwell as his wife and acknowledged this relationship to the witness.
Both were involved in organizing and hosting a student trip to New Mexico, with Maxwell tasked with watching the students.
Epstein called the witness starting around 1995, discussed trips, and sponsored student travel.

events.title: Initial Contact with Epstein
events.description: The witness first heard of Jeffrey Epstein and began receiving phone calls from him around this time.

events.title: New Mexico Student Trip
events.description: Epstein sponsored a trip for 20-25 students to New Mexico. Ghislaine Maxwell was to host and watch the students. The witness's friend attended and returned upset, with new boots bought by Maxwell, and later expressed fear of Epstein and Maxwell.

events.title: Media Interview Attempt
events.description: A reporter contacted the witness's friend to conduct an interview about her experience. The friend was scared and sought permission from the witness. The article never materialized.

events.title: FBI Interview of Witness
events.description: The witness was interviewed by an AUSA, an FBI Special Agent, and a Detective via video conference regarding their knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: The witness knew Jeffrey Epstein starting around 1995 and he referred to Ghislaine Maxwell as his wife.
Epstein sponsored a trip for students to New Mexico in 1996 where Ghislaine Maxwell was to host and watch them.
The witness's friend who went on the trip returned upset and fearful, later stating Epstein and Maxwell were 'too rich and powerful to fight' and 'could make [her] disappear'.
The friend was so scared of Maxwell that she moved multiple times to get away.
The FBI interview was conducted in 2020, indicating ongoing investigation into historical events involving Epstein and Maxwell.
